release.action: Fix cache management to reduce memory usage.
Fix possible duplicate xml closing elements in opensearch answer.
Add new element "ingrid:iso-xml-url" to the opensearch result. This element contains the metadata xml access url if it exists for the result dataset.
Fix opensearch interface, fix the correct usage of the url to display detailed view of metadata results.
Do not render type attributes to links if the feed is accessed by an IE browser. Otherwise the links will not be active.
Add long names to ingrid specific data in opensearch results.
Installer: Do not overwrite communication.xml on update-mode.
Add long names for partner and provider as partner-name and provider-name tags.
Do not crash on timeout exception, if an external resource (GetRecordByIdResponse) is not available.
Add configurable timeout for accessing an external resource (GetRecordByIdResponse).
